report.title: MNHNL Bats Grid
report.description: Form Internal Report: Used by the Samples grid on the MNHNL Bats Form to retrieve the samples associated with a survey and user.
report.query: SELECT s.id as sample_id, l.name as location_name, loccommune.text_value as commune, locvillage.text_value as village, username.text_value as username, regexp_replace(l.centroid_sref, ',|\\.[0-9]*' , '', 'g') as xy, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type FROM samples s LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values locvillage ON locvillage.location_id = l.id and locvillage.deleted = FALSE and locvillage.location_attribute_id = #village_attr_id# LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values loccommune ON loccommune.location_id = l.id and loccommune.deleted = FALSE and loccommune.location_attribute_id = #commune_attr_id# LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values username ON username.sample_id = s.id and username.deleted = FALSE and username.sample_attribute_id = #username_attr_id# WHERE s.survey_id=#survey_id# AND s.deleted = FALSE AND ((#userID# > 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT id FROM sample_attribute_values sav WHERE sav.sample_id = s.id AND sav.sample_attribute_id = #userID_attr_id# AND sav.int_value = #userID#)) OR (#userID# <= 0)) #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for?
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: userID_attr_id
param.description: Sample Attribute ID used to Identify User

param.name: userID
param.description: CMS User ID: use -1 for non logged in people

param.name: village_attr_id
param.description: Location Attribute ID used to Identify the Village

param.name: commune_attr_id
param.description: Location Attribute ID used to Identify the Commune

param.name: username_attr_id
param.description: Sample Attribute ID used to Identify Username
